Incident.name: Unable to use SSH on NCSU wireless

work_notes.note: I can't run putty when connected to NCSU
Make sure that you're connected to the NCSU or eduroam networks. ncsu-guest is port restricted and won't allow connections through port 22.
Thanks for the info. That fixed it!
